Description:
Attempting to disable scheduled scanning and other parts of Windows Defender ATP or set default actions to allow.

Author: frack113, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Tamper Windows Defender - PSClassic
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (data like '%set-mppreference%' and ((data like '%highthreatdefaultaction allow%' or data like '%htdefac allow%' or data like '%lowthreatdefaultaction allow%' or data like '%ltdefac allow%' or data like '%moderatethreatdefaultaction allow%' or data like '%mtdefac allow%' or data like '%severethreatdefaultaction allow%' or data like '%stdefac allow%') or (data like '%-dbaf $true%' or data like '%-dbaf 1%' or data like '%-dbm $true%' or data like '%-dbm 1%' or data like '%-dips $true%' or data like '%-dips 1%' or data like '%-disablearchivescanning $true%' or data like '%-disablearchivescanning 1%' or data like '%-disablebehaviormonitoring $true%' or data like '%-disablebehaviormonitoring 1%' or data like '%-disableblockatfirstseen $true%' or data like '%-disableblockatfirstseen 1%' or data like '%-disablecatchupfullscan $true%' or data like '%-disablecatchupfullscan 1%' or data like '%-disablecatchupquickscan $true%' or data like '%-disablecatchupquickscan 1%' or data like '%-disableintrusionpreventionsystem $true%' or data like '%-disableintrusionpreventionsystem 1%' or data like '%-disableioavprotection $true%' or data like '%-disableioavprotection 1%' or data like '%-disablerealtimemonitoring $true%' or data like '%-disablerealtimemonitoring 1%' or data like '%-disableremovabledrivescanning $true%' or data like '%-disableremovabledrivescanning 1%' or data like '%-disablescanningmappednetworkdrivesforfullscan $true%' or data like '%-disablescanningmappednetworkdrivesforfullscan 1%' or data like '%-disablescanningnetworkfiles $true%' or data like '%-disablescanningnetworkfiles 1%' or data like '%-disablescriptscanning $true%' or data like '%-disablescriptscanning 1%' or data like '%-mapsreporting $false%' or data like '%-mapsreporting 0%' or data like '%-drdsc $true%' or data like '%-drdsc 1%' or data like '%-drtm $true%' or data like '%-drtm 1%' or data like '%-dscrptsc $true%' or data like '%-dscrptsc 1%' or data like '%-dsmndf $true%' or data like '%-dsmndf 1%' or data like '%-dsnf $true%' or data like '%-dsnf 1%' or data like '%-dss $true%' or data like '%-dss 1%')))
